item.description:
Ladies, Gentlemen,

Join us this Saturday. You are welcome whether you are young/old, good/bad, want to meet people/want to play football/want to exercise. We have a regular group that meets to play flag football, and we're always excited to have new people join us.

Public Transport - Redline to Alewife Stop -> Follow Rindge Ave signs -> Look for the stadium lights -> We'll be at the turf field with the fieldhouse next to it.

Hope to see you Saturday,
-Frank
item.name: SAT - 3PM - FLAG FOOTBALL
